panels.narration: JAZZY: The following really happened at about 7:00 MST. Ask anyone mentioned if you doubt me. I'm the one called Eli.

left.text: i am swallowing the first pill. only about 3 or 4 more until there is no turning back

right.text: GIVE ME A FUCKING REASON TO LIVE OR I'M TAKING THE SECOND PILL!!!!

left.text: eli YOUR GOD GAVE ME PSORIASIS

right.text: that's it, i've taken the second pill
